name: Blast and the Furious
description:
Blast and the Furious

You are hired as a driver to be part of the crew. A crack team of criminals looking to infiltrate and retrieve intel. You have been given a new concept car attached with a grappling hook and launcher. Train your driving, drifting, and launching skills before heading out on your "First Heist"

Pick up bombs using the grappling hook before launching them into door control terminals or other cars. 

If you are having performance issues in the browser please download the executable.

Controls

  • Drive - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Drop / Pickup - Space
  • Cycle Through Levels - < , >
  • Cycle Music - M
  • Reset Level - R
  • Back to Menu - Escape

Created for the GMTK Games Jam 2021. Theme "Joined Together"

Credits

Code, Design - Sam Vickery

Art - Unity Asset Store (Synty Studios)

Music - Various SFX and Music packs
